title._content: [Bosphorus (i.e., Bosporus), Rumeli and Anadali-Hissar, (i.e., Anadolu Hissarı) Constantinople, Turkey] (LOC)

description._content: [Bosphorus (i.e., Bosporus), Rumeli and Anadali-Hissar, (i.e., Anadolu Hissarı) Constantinople, Turkey] [between ca. 1890 and ca. 1900]. 1 photomechanical print : photochrom, color. Notes: Title from the Detroit Publishing Co., Catalogue J--foreign section, Detroit, Mich. : Detroit Publishing Company, 1905. Print no. "16523". Forms part of: Views of People and sites in Turkey in the Photochrom print collection. Subjects: Turkey--Istanbul. Format: Photochrom prints--Color--1890-1900. Rights Info: No known restrictions on reproduction. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Views of people and sites in Turkey (DLC) 2001698827 More information about the Photochrom Print Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.pgz Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsc.06080 Call Number: LOT 13428, no. 022 [item]
